I'm Kenneth Garcia,

UX/UI Designer, Web Developer, e-Commerce Guru

Crafting user-friendly experiences, one website at a time.

Check my Work Contact Me

About

Here is a little more about myself...

I'm a passionate web developer who thrives on turning ideas into reality. From sketches to fully functional websites, I love the process of bringing a business concept to life through code. I specialize in front-end development and Content Management Systems like WordPress and Shopify, but my knowledge extends to back-end technologies like PHP and MySQL. This allows me to craft beautiful, user-centric websites that are not only mobile-friendly but also easy to maintain and scale as your business grows.

Let's collaborate on building your next great website! Explore my portfolio to see examples of my work and how I can help you achieve your online goals.

Skills

Here is an insight on my Skill Set and Experience.

Responsive Design

Websites that adjust to any screen size, from desktops to phones.

Fast Performance

SEO Optimization

Optimize website visibility in search engine results.

Scalable Architecture

Flexible infrastructure, ready for further expansion.
